content.p: The University offers a comprehensive Cycle to Work scheme accessible through the Employee Hub. Operated on a salary sacrifice basis, the scheme allows employees to hire a bike and equipment from the University for twelve months and has increased the value of the scheme to enable staff to purchase bicycles up to the value of Â£4,000. After this period the employee may, at the University's and scheme provider's discretion, be offered options to extend the hire agreement or take ownership of the bike. Estate Office, University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD Email: sustainability@nottingham.ac.uk
